text: Taupin is a surname. Notable people with the name include: *André Taupin (born 1909), French sports shooter *Bernie Taupin (born 1950), English lyricist, poet, and singer *Eloi Charlemagne Taupin (1767–1814), French army general *René Taupin (1905–1981), French translator, critic, and academic ==See also== *Toupin, surname
title: Taupin (surname)
